Investor_13_pre_2.name: Emma Dubois
Investor_13_pre_2.content: During the investment process, I exhibited a strong commitment to collaboration and trust, effectively communicating my expectations from the start and ensuring transparency in our interactions. My approach reflects a desire for fairness and collective success, which contributes positively to my reputation as a reliable investor.

Investor_13_pre_3.name: Emma Dubois
Investor_13_pre_3.content: Throughout the investment process, I demonstrated a strong commitment to collaboration and transparency. I clearly communicated my expectations about profit distribution from the beginning, which fostered trust and facilitated a successful outcome. My focus on fairness has enhanced my reputation as a reliable and transparent investor, as evidenced by the alignment of actual returns with initial expectations.
